title: Colorado Blaze
description: An Echo comes and goes and she breaks his heart everytime.Run. Echo is good at running. She runs for the rodeo checks, she runs from her troubles and she runs from the truth. And that is, no matter the miles or years between them, she will always love Blaze Tipton. Until her whole world is turned upside down and her barrel racing horses are stolen. All broken roads lead to Blaze. Roots. That's what Blaze needs. He's built a rancher's empire and he's waited for Echo to come home to Colorado. But when Echo finally returns, she doesn't come back to fulfill an old promise, she's back with trouble on her heels. Broken proposals, family secrets and a surprising twist that will forever seal their fate. Is it too much for love to overcome? Colorado Blaze features barrel racing, ranching and snowy Colorado nights spent warm under the covers. Don't miss it! Colorado Blaze is an adult mid level heated romance. Not for under eighteen readers.
author: Elle Marlow
